stockmarketsim

Class StockMarket

extends java.lang.Object
    A stock market for holding exchanges and traders

      • simulateInterval

        public void simulateInterval(boolean closingTime)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates any pending offers the traders have made
        Parameters:
        closingTime - Is it at the end of a market day?
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws an error if the period could not be simulated
